  • Method Details

    • verifyMessage

      public void verifyMessage(SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage, EngineConfiguration configuration, EngineContext context) throws UnrecoverableSignServiceException, SignServiceErrorException
      Verifies a SignRequestMessage. The verification includes signature verification and checks on the actual message to ensure that what is requested is accepted by the SignService engine.
      Specified by:
      verifyMessage in interface SignRequestMessageVerifier
      Parameters:
      signRequestMessage - the sign request message
      configuration - the engine configuration
      context - the engine context
      Throws:
      UnrecoverableSignServiceException - for unrecovetable errors
      SignServiceErrorException - for errors that will yield an error response being sent back to the client

    • setAllowedClockSkew

      public void setAllowedClockSkew(@Nonnull Duration allowedClockSkew)
      The clock skew that we accept during checks of time stamps. The default is 30 seconds.
      Parameters:
      allowedClockSkew - the allowed clock skew

    • setMaxMessageAge

      public void setMaxMessageAge(@Nonnull Duration maxMessageAge)
      The maximum amount of time that has passed since the request message was created.
      Parameters:
      maxMessageAge - the max message age
